    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ArrayHandler
    Class for handling 2d array copying
    BaseScene
    BaseSceneBaseScene.java Creates a scene
    Board
    Util.Board.java Creates a grid of slots
    BoardHandler
    The BoardHandler class runs the logic for finding the best move given a 2D array of a board.
    ButtonBuilder
    ButtonBuilder.java Abstract class for making the blueprint of a button
    Circle
    Circle.java creates the checkers for player1 (red) and player2 (blue)
    GravityHandler
    Handles any board/pieces interactions to do with gravity It makes sure all pieces are at the bottommost positions and has checks for if a column is filled (from gravity)
    HelpButton
    HelpButton.java Extends ButtonBuilder.java Creates a button that upon click, shows a dialog that explains expected inputs
    Input
    HelpButton.java Extends TextAreaBuilder.java Implements an input interface using textarea
    InputButton
    InputButton.java Extends ButtonBuilder.java Creates a button that manages Input.java
    InputHandler
    Checks user input for placing pieces in the correct range of columns, specified by a constructor
    Main
    Main.java Starts the program and makes a stage
    MenuNodes
    MenuNodes.java Contains the GUI nodes for the starting menu
    MenuScene
    MenuScene.java Extends BaseScene.
    Output
    Output.java Extends TextAreaBuilder.java Implements an output interface that shows text using textarea
    PlayNodes
    PlayNodes.java Contains the GUI nodes for the main interface
    PlayScene
    PlayScene.java Extends BaseScene.
    RestartButton
    RestartButton.java Extends ButtonBuilder.java Creates a button that restarts the game
    Slot
    Slot.java creates a slot that can have a checker inside
    StageBuilder
    StageBuilder.java creates the main stage and its scenes
    TextAreaBuilder
    TextAreaBuilder.java Abstract class for making the blueprint of a textarea
    TextBuilder
    TextBuilder.java Makes text
